House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00044
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING A TEN PERCENT BUDGETARY ALLOCATION OF BARANGAYS FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF PROGRAMS, PROJECTS, ACTIVITIES, AND SERVICES FOR SENIOR CITIZENS, AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE THE PERTINENT PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT 7160 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "LOCAL GOVERNMENT CODE" AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Authorizes the allocation of ten percent (10%) of the total internal revenue allotment (IRA) for barangays for the implementation of their plans, programs, projects, activities, and services for senior citizens.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : QUIMBO, ROMERO "MIRO" S.
